page.title: 16Services in Halsall
page.content: The Police Station in Halsall has only one officer. He told us there was not much crime in Halsall as it is a relatively quiet area, having only about 1472 people. There are no cells in the Station because it is a house and the policeman and his wife live upstairs. The Telephone Exchange has 1100 lines and covers Barton, Halsall and part of Scarisbrick. It has one full-time worker and one part-time cleaner. The Exchange falls within the Preston Telephone area. Most of the people we interviewed liked to shop in nearby towns, but there are local shops including a general store, a chip shop and a vegetable store.
